subject: Hockey, Ice
Automobiles
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: When the Islanders move from Nassau Coliseum to Barclays Center in Brooklyn next season, they will leave behind a tailgating culture supported by die-hard fans.
snippet: When the Islanders move from Nassau Coliseum to Barclays Center in Brooklyn next season, they will leave behind a tailgating culture supported by die-hard fans.
